long_description: Made with a stretchy, windproof, water-resistant fabric that features high recycled content, the Lole Pride jacket for women offers versatile warmth on the cross-country ski trail or running path. Breathable fabric blocks wind and features a Durable Water Repellent finish that causes light moisture to bead up and roll off. The Lole Pride jacket features a micropolar polyester fleece lining that adds warmth in the cold; fleece panels at sides enhance breathability. Center-front zip; stand-up collar; stowable hood; half-elastic at cuffs; cinchable hem; zip hand pockets; reflective tape.
short_description: Made with a stretchy, windproof, water-resistant fabric that features high recycled content, the Lole Pride jacket for women offers versatile warmth on the cross-country ski trail or running path.
